issue.title: [Packaging] Crossbow fails to detect missing builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10409](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10409). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In the nightly reports the conda aarch64 builds are highlighted as passed ones although drone doesn't pick up the submitted tasks.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10409?focusedCommentId=17383373) by Krisztian Szucs (kszucs):*
